title: Enter for your chance to win CNET's Sony Sound Sweepstakes* - CNET
description: Five lucky winners will score a Sony WH-1000XM3 wireless noise-canceling headphone. *Our latest giveaway is open to the US, Puerto Rico and Canada (excluding Quebec).
content: CNET Need something to take your mind off This Coronavirus Life Start by taking your ears off it ideally by listening to your favorite calming music podcasts like say This American Life and meditations Of course to really enjoy that stuff you ll wa chars
